name: cbiC1
tagline: Computational Biology tools on Colonial One
body:
### Computational Biology apps on Colonial One

### Adding cbiC1 modules to your module path

You can add these tools and python modules to you path using EnvironmentModules. Just tell modules to look for a module file, then load the `cbiC1` module:

```
module use /groups/cbi/shared/modulefiles
module load cbiC1
```

### Authors and Contributors
If you would like to contribute please contact Matthew Bendall (@mlbendall)

### Support or Contact
